abstract: Members of a Senate panel accused Caterpillar of channeling its most profitable operations through a subsidiary in Switzerland.
snippet: Members of a Senate panel accused Caterpillar of channeling its most profitable operations through a subsidiary in Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Officials of Caterpillar sparred with members of a Senate panel on Tuesday, defending more than a decade’s worth of tax practices that put most of the company’s profits out of reach of United States tax authorities.

headline.main: At Hearing, Caterpillar Defends Tax Practices
headline.print_headline: At Hearing, Caterpillar Defends Tax Practices
